name: Marie
placeOfBirth: East Jessicamouth, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago)
description: Marie is a gray-eyed llama with black hair, standing 192 cm tall. Originally from East Jessicamouth, British Indian Ocean Territory (Chagos Archipelago), Marie enjoys dancing, singing, painting. Known for their gentle and gentle personality, Marie is a beloved member of the llama community.
